title: Junior Data Analyst
Job Description: Analyze data using SQL, Excel, Python. Build dashboards in Tableau or Power BI. Communicate insights.

title: ML Engineer
Job Description: Design ML pipelines with scikit-learn or PyTorch. Deploy models with Flask/FastAPI. Use Docker and cloud.

title: Frontend Developer
Job Description: Build responsive UIs using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React. Collaborate with designers and backend teams.

title: Backend Developer
Job Description: Design REST APIs in Python/Django or Node/Express. Work with databases and authentication.

title: Data Scientist
Job Description: Explore data, build predictive models, feature engineering, model evaluation and presentation.
